item.title: Contributing to open-source: Lessons learned
item.description:
☀️ Introduction

I was recently given the recognition by the folks at IceVision to be part of the core-developer team! Farid Hassainia, a co-creator of the IceVision Tweeted about it on March 17, 2022.

We are super excited to introduce you to our 🎉New Core-Dev: Dickson Neoh @dicksonneoh7

Dickson is actively contributing to IceVision. He ardently helps IceVision users in our Discord Community.

We are very happy to have him on our team! pic.twitter.com/SO1qLHkarm
